name: Combat Rush
description: This "snake", but instead of the snake you have mercenaries with weapons in their hands! Gather your own squad of professional mercenaries and defeat enemies who threaten the world with their weapons!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and later Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2005 or newer graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and later Processor: 3.10GHz or faster x86-compatible processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 or newer graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
